show_name: Go! Princess Pretty Cure the Movie Go! Go!! Gorgeous Triple Feature!!!
other_title: Eiga Go! Princess Precure Go! Go!! Gōka 3-bon Date!!! (Japanese)
映画Ｇｏ！プリンセスプリキュア Ｇｏ！Ｇｏ！！豪華３本立て！！！ (Japanese)
plot: Three separate parts: In part one, Cure Flora encounters some mischievous spirits when she wants to check out her new tiara in a mirror. In part two, the whole team participates in a princess contest in the Pumpkin Kingdom, but the organizing minister turns out to have evil plans for both the kingdom and the Cures. In part three, a girl named Refi calls the Cures to a town where it's always night to help her take it back from the evil Night Pumpkin.
